alert.note: Alert for Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 8:41PM EDT until July 02 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Owsley County in southeastern Kentucky... Southern Estill County in east central Kentucky... Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Rockcastle County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... North central Clay County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 841 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eglon, or 8 miles west of McKee, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sandgap around 845 PM EDT. Waneta around 850 PM EDT. Foxtown around 855 PM EDT. McKee around 900 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include New Zion and Wild Dog. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Rockcastle
